src/CdcGeometryParameter.cc

00001 //Description: Handle database I/O and user interface 
00002 //             for CDC geometry parameters
00003 //Author: Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00004 //Created: 6 Oct, 2012
00005 //Modified:
00006 //Comment: The units are "mm"(default), "um"(for wire radius) and "rad". 
00007 //Comment: for SPhi, Datum plain is forward end plate of CDC
00008 //Comment: about layer_type:
00009 //         phi direction: 
00010 //                0_________2pi
00011 //
00012 //         r   direction:
00013 //                 ^  Cdc_RMax
00014 //                 |
00015 //                 |
00016 //                 |  0
00017 //
00018 //         TYPE 0: Ordinary layer
00019 //                 ________ each cell is a twisted(or not) tube with 
00020 //                 |      | 3 field wires and 1 signal wire inside
00021 //                 |o  x  |
00022 //                 |      |
00023 //                 |o  o  |
00024 //                 --------
00025 //
00026 //         TYPE 1: Out most layer
00027 //                 ________ each cell is a twisted(or not) tube with 
00028 //                 |o  o  | 5 field wires and 1 signal wire inside
00029 //                 |      |
00030 //                 |o  x  |
00031 //                 |      |
00032 //                 |o  o  |
00033 //                 --------
00034 //
00035 //         TYPE 2/3/4/5: Stereo layer upon an axial layer/
00036 //                       Axial layer beneath a stereo layer/
00037 //                       Axial layer upon a stereo layer/
00038 //                       Stereo layer beneath an axial layer/
00039 //                 __________ each cell is a G4TwistedTube subtracted by a G4Hype
00040 //                 |        | with 3 field wire and 1 signal wire inside
00041 //                 |o0  x   | for TYPE 2/4, the innerward two field wires
00042 //                 |        | have the rotate angle as half as the stereo layer
00043 //                 |o1  o2  | 
00044 //                 ---------- 
00045 //Comment: fVerboseLevel: 0:   Just Warning Messages and Error Messages
00046 //                        >=5: All informations
00047 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00048 
00049 #include <iostream>
00050 #include <fstream>

00052 #include <iomanip>

00059 #include "CdcGeometryParameter.hh"

00061 CdcGeometryParameter::CdcGeometryParameter(G4String name, G4String opt )
00062         : SimpleGeometryParameter(name, "S") // Use a not-empty opt to stop inherited class from creating new GeometryParameterMessenger
00063 {
00064         if ( opt == "" ){
00065                 CdcGeometryParameterMessenger *pointer = new CdcGeometryParameterMessenger(this, name);
00066                 //std::cout<<"======>In CdcGeometryParameter, new CdcGeometryParameterMessenger at ("<<(void*)pointer<<")!"<<std::endl;
00067                 set_GeometryParameterMessenger(pointer);
00068         }
00069 }
00070 
00071 CdcGeometryParameter::~CdcGeometryParameter(){
00072         printf("~CdcGeometryParameter");
00073 }

00075 //---------------------------InitFromFile---------------------------------
00076 //will be called in CdcGeometrySvc::SetCdc
00077 void CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile( G4String file_name ){
00078         set_filename(file_name);
00079 
00080         //Remember to preset first!
00081         Preset();
00082 
00083         std::ifstream fin_card(file_name);
00084         if(!fin_card){
00085                 DEBUG("CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile(), cannot find subgeometry card: \""+file_name+"\"");
00086         }
00087         std::string s_card;
00088         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00089                 //eleminate useless lines
00090                 if ( ISEMPTY(s_card) ) continue;
00091                 int status = GetValue(s_card);
00092                 if( status > 0 ){
00093                         G4String content = "CdcGeometryParameter: unknown line:" + s_card + "\n  in file " + file_name + "! Will ignore this line!";
00094                         DEBUG(content,0);
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         fin_card.close();
00098         if (CheckInfo()){
00099                 DEBUG("CdcGeometryParameter::InitFromFile(), insufficient simple solid info");
00100         }
00101         Calculate();
00102 }
00103 
00104 void CdcGeometryParameter::Dump(){
00105         DumpInfo();
00106 }

00108 //-----------------------------------Special functions---------------------------------------------
00109 
00110 bool CdcGeometryParameter::CheckInfo(){
00111         bool flag = false;// false means no problem
00112         flag = SimpleGeometryParameter::CheckInfo();
00113         if (flag) return flag;// if something is wrong with its Parent Class, then return the status.
00114 
00115         //examine
00116         if(     !check_LayerNo(layer_RMin.size()) ||
00117                         !check_LayerNo(layer_length.size()) ){
00118                 flag = true;
00119         }
00120         return flag;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void CdcGeometryParameter::Preset(){
00124         SimpleGeometryParameter::Preset();// Call its Parent class to preset
00125         vis_cell = false;
00126         vis_layer = false;
00127         vis_SignalWire = false;
00128         vis_FieldWire = false;
00129         LayerNo = 0;
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 int CdcGeometryParameter::GetValue(G4String s_card){
00134         if (!SimpleGeometryParameter::GetValue(s_card)) return 0; // if found by Parent Class, then return.
00135         int status = 0;// 0 means found the value
00136         std::stringstream buf_card;
00137         buf_card.str("");
00138         buf_card.clear();
00139         buf_card<<s_card;
00140         std::string name;
00141         buf_card>>name;
00142         std::string s_para;
00143         if( name == "MotherLogicalVolume:" ) buf_card>>MotherLogicalVolume;
00144         else if( name == "CellMaterial:" ) buf_card>>CellMaterial;
00145         else if( name == "SensitiveDetector:" ) buf_card>>SensitiveDetector;
00146         else if( name == "SDVolumeName:" ) buf_card>>SDVolumeName;
00147         else if( name == "SignalWireMaterial:" ) buf_card>>SignalWireMaterial;
00148         else if( name == "FieldWireMaterial:" ) buf_card>>FieldWireMaterial;
00149         else if( name == "SignalWireRadius:" ) {
00150                 buf_card>>SignalWireRadius;
00151                 SignalWireRadius *= um;
00152         }
00153         else if( name == "FieldWireRadius:" ) {
00154                 buf_card>>FieldWireRadius;
00155                 FieldWireRadius *= um;
00156         }
00157         else if( name == "LayerNo:" ) buf_card>>LayerNo;
00158         else if( name == "vis_layer" ){
00159                 vis_layer = true;
00160                 buf_card>>r_layer>>g_layer>>b_layer;
00161         }
00162         else if( name == "vis_cell" ){
00163                 vis_cell = true;
00164                 buf_card>>r_cell>>g_cell>>b_cell;
00165         }
00166         else if( name == "vis_FieldWire" ){
00167                 vis_FieldWire = true;
00168                 buf_card>>r_FieldWire>>g_FieldWire>>b_FieldWire;
00169         }
00170         else if( name == "vis_SignalWire" ){
00171                 vis_SignalWire = true;
00172                 buf_card>>r_SignalWire>>g_SignalWire>>b_SignalWire;
00173         }
00174         else{
00175                 std::stringstream buf_temp;
00176                 if( name == "F" ){
00177                         std::string dump;
00178                         G4double tlayer_RMin;
00179                         buf_card>>tlayer_RMin;
00180                         tlayer_RMin *= mm;
00181                         layer_RMin.push_back(tlayer_RMin);
00182                 }
00183                 else if( name == "S" ){
00184                         std::string dump;
00185                         G4int twire_num, tlayer_firstWire;
00186                         G4double tlayer_ncells4rotate;
00187                         G4double tlayer_RMid, tlayer_length, tlayer_SPhi;
00188                         buf_card>>dump>>dump>>twire_num>>tlayer_length>>tlayer_RMid>>tlayer_SPhi>>tlayer_firstWire>>tlayer_ncells4rotate;
00189                         tlayer_length *= mm;
00190                         tlayer_RMid *= mm;
00191                         tlayer_SPhi *= rad;
00192                         layer_cell_num.push_back(twire_num);
00193                         layer_length.push_back(tlayer_length);
00194                         layer_RMid.push_back(tlayer_RMid);
00195                         layer_SPhi.push_back(tlayer_SPhi);
00196                         layer_firstWire.push_back(tlayer_firstWire);
00197                         layer_ncells4rotate.push_back(tlayer_ncells4rotate);
00198                 }
00199                 else if( name == "LF" ){
00200                         std::string dump;
00201                         buf_card>>Cdc_RMax;
00202                 }
00203                 else{
00204                         status = 1;
00205                 }
00206                 buf_temp.str("");
00207                 buf_temp.clear();
00208         }
00209         buf_card.str("");
00210         buf_card.clear();
00211         return status;
00212 }
00213 
00214 //--------------------------Calculate---------------------------------
00215 //
00216 void CdcGeometryParameter::Calculate(){
00217         SimpleGeometryParameter::Calculate();
00218         layer_angle4rotate.resize(LayerNo);
00219         layer_type.resize(LayerNo);
00220         layer_cell_startNo.resize(LayerNo+1);
00221         layer_cell_dphi.resize(LayerNo);
00222         for ( G4int i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00223                 //set layer_cell_startNo 
00224                 if ( i == 0 ){
00225                         layer_cell_startNo[i] = 0;
00226                 }
00227                 else{
00228                         layer_cell_startNo[i] = layer_cell_startNo[i-1] + layer_cell_num[i-1];
00229                 }
00230                 if ( i == LayerNo - 1 ){
00231                         layer_cell_startNo[i+1] = layer_cell_startNo[i] + layer_cell_num[i];
00232                 }
00233                 //set layer_angle4rotate
00234                 layer_angle4rotate[i] = 2*pi*layer_ncells4rotate[i]/layer_cell_num[i];
00235                 //set layer_cell_dphi
00236                 layer_cell_dphi[i] = 2*pi/layer_cell_num[i];
00237                 G4double R;
00238                 if (i == LayerNo - 1) R = Cdc_RMax;
00239                 else R = layer_RMin[i+1];
00240                 //set layer_type
00241                 if ( i == LayerNo -1 ){
00242                         layer_type[i] = 1;//TYPE 1: Out most layer
00243                 }
00244                 else if ( fabs(layer_ncells4rotate[i]) != fabs(layer_ncells4rotate[i+1]) ){
00245                         if ( layer_ncells4rotate[i] == 0 ){
00246                                 layer_type[i] = 3;//TYPE 3: Axial layer beneath a stereo layer
00247                         }
00248                         else{
00249                                 layer_type[i] = 5;//TYPE 5: Stereo layer beneath an axial layer
00250                         }
00251                 }
00252                 else if ( i != 0 ? fabs(layer_ncells4rotate[i]) != fabs(layer_ncells4rotate[i-1]) : 0 ){
00253                         if ( layer_ncells4rotate[i] == 0 ){
00254                                 layer_type[i] = 4;//TYPE 4: Axial layer upon a stereo layer
00255                         }
00256                         else{
00257                                 layer_type[i] = 2;//TYPE 2: Stereo layer upon an axial layer
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260                 else{
00261                         layer_type[i] = 0;//TYPE 0: Ordinary layer
00262                 }
00263         }
00264 }

00266 //---------------------------DumpInfo---------------------------------
00267 //output information
00268 void CdcGeometryParameter::DumpInfo() {
00269         SimpleGeometryParameter::DumpInfo();// dump info of its Parent Class first
00270         std::cout<<"------CdcGeometry info :--------"<<std::endl;
00271         std::cout<<"=>General info:"<<std::endl;
00272         std::cout<<" MotherLogicalVolume:  "<<MotherLogicalVolume<<std::endl;
00273         std::cout<<" SensitiveDetector:    "<<SensitiveDetector<<std::endl;
00274         std::cout<<" SDVolumeName:         "<<SDVolumeName<<std::endl;
00275 
00276         std::cout<<"=>Wires info:"<<std::endl;
00277         std::cout<<" SignalWireRadius:     "<<SignalWireRadius/um<<"um"<<std::endl;
00278         std::cout<<" FieldWireRadius:      "<<FieldWireRadius/um<<"um"<<std::endl;
00279         std::cout<<" signalWire material:  "<<SignalWireMaterial<<std::endl;
00280         std::cout<<" fieldWire material:   "<<FieldWireMaterial<<std::endl;
00281 
00282         std::cout<<"=>Layers info:"<<std::endl;
00283         std::cout<<" LayerNo: "<<LayerNo<<std::endl;
00284         std::cout<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"No."
00285                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<"StartR"
00286                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(8) <<"MiddleR"
00287                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<"length"
00288                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(9) <<"StartPhi"
00289                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(11)<<"RotateCell"
00290                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(17)<<"FirstWire"
00291                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<"CellNo"
00292                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<"type"
00293                 <<std::endl;
00294         std::cout<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<""
00295                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<"mm"
00296                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(8) <<"mm"
00297                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<"mm"
00298                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(9) <<"rad"
00299                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(11)<<""
00300                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(17)<<"1:signal/0:field"
00301                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<""
00302                 <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<""
00303                 <<std::endl;
00304         for ( G4int i = 0; i < LayerNo; i++ ){
00305                 std::cout<<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<i
00306                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<layer_RMin[i]/mm
00307                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(8) <<layer_RMid[i]/mm
00308                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<layer_length[i]/mm
00309                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(9) <<layer_SPhi[i]/rad
00310                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(11)<<layer_ncells4rotate[i]
00311                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(17)<<layer_firstWire[i]
00312                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(7) <<layer_cell_num[i]
00313                         <<std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)<<std::setw(5) <<layer_type[i]
00314                         <<std::endl;
00315         }
00316         std::cout<<"Out most radius: "<<Cdc_RMax<<"mm"<<std::endl;
00317 }
